title: Soothing Sleeping Face
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>It’s raining, what an unlucky day zura.... Even though it wasn’t raining until just a bit ago....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>....Huh? That’s.... Heeey, Kanan-chaaan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Hanamaru-chan! Shhh!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Eh, sorry zura.... What are you doing, Kanan-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Fufu, look at this girl.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Waaah, it’s a cat zura! How cute~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Right? I was going to the staff room to talk about some stuff, but her sleeping face was just so cute that I’d feel bad for waking her up.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Fufu, you’re right. She’s all curled up under your umbrella zura.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Well, I can’t leave her like this forever, so I guess I’ll take her to the staff room in 5 minutes.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru is coming too! Until then, Maru will enjoy her sleeping face zura♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
